## Summary
What is changing and why?

## Artifact Type
- [ ] Doctrine
- [ ] Playbook
- [ ] Template
- [ ] Research
- [ ] System / Governance

## Authority Check
- [ ] ML1 approval required
- [ ] Derived from existing approved doctrine
- [ ] No authority impact

## Impacted Files
List files added/modified/deprecated.

## Notes
Anything a future reviewer should know.
